config.hardnesspatch.title: Hardness Patch Config
config.hardnesspatch.add_entry: Add new block to the list. Type a block ID the empty entry. Then, save and reopen the config to edit the hardness for your block.
config.hardnesspatch.remove_tooltip: Toggle 'Yes' and Save to remove this entry
config.hardnesspatch.broken: Please use the delete toggle in the entry for a block instead
config.hardnesspatch.messageimmediate: No need to restart your client, changes apply immediately.
